attributes.review: This app is horribly slow and took a whole month to download. Plus it took all of my storage up on plus the data on my phone. I would think that the money that trump has he could of at least made a decent app at least to invest. TRUMP SHOULD DO BETTER. 🍊🌿😕
attributes.title: 🍊Horrrrrriiiiibbbbllleee🍊

attributes.review: My pet rock died because of this app.🤧 Guys do not get it your pet rocks WILL DIE!!! 🤒I had high hopes for this app but because of the death of my family member, I will never forgive the creator of this app. 🤬 I am crying now as I read this. 😢😭This app killed part of me, it killed my most beloved possession. 😣RIP Crunch ⭐️, I will never forget you. 😖
attributes.title: Caused a death 😞

attributes.review: This app is honestly really useless first off it took almost 3 weeks to download and load anything and when I opened it and just closed it again because again it’s useless and no point to downloading this garbage of an app.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Horrible too much ads too much glitches to much tanning spray too much everything might turn orange through the screen don’t vote for him as Mexicans are very hardworking people and as he tries to take away our young communtiy to ICE we don’t stand for this kind of behavior in the Gen Z society 🤝🗣
attributes.title: No no no just no ❌

attributes.review: This app is probably the most outdated and buggy apps I have ever downloaded in my life. It keeps glitching out and not letting me tap what I wanted to read. I downloaded this to “educate” myself, but had no opportunities to do so because of how badly the app was developed. Very disappointed.
attributes.title: Worst app I have ever downloaded

attributes.review: this app made my phone crash and overheat as soon as i downloaded it and tried to use it.  i ended up having to buy a new phone without the app. the app was hard to navigate glitched wasn’t good either
attributes.title: Do not download if you don’t want to buy a new phone

attributes.review: This app crashed my phone. This app gives content of complete lies. The news I am receiving reminds me of fascist nazi-Germany. If I wanted to read complete dementia ridden nonsense I would listen to Joe Biden.. now I am hearing data is being harvested from my phone causing it to crash. Is this the Trump 2020 app or the China Surveillance State app?????.........??????
attributes.title: Very dissatisfied.

attributes.review:
The app has been so glitchy ever since I got it. I would log in and it would crash and send me back to the home page. I then went back in signed in and I would mess around, and everything would freeze then crash. Smh....

✨ This Is Revenge Orangie ✨
attributes.title: To Glitchy

attributes.review: Honestly, it’s not that great of an app. I wanted it so I could keep updated on what Trump was doing ,but It required me to put in my cell phone number and it pretty much spammed me with texts and call trying to get me to donate money. So unless you’re willing to donate money for trump every single day, don’t get it.
attributes.title: Spammed me

attributes.review: I just downloaded it today and the first thing to greet me is this revolting wrinkly bigot stinky ugly terrible orange man. I tried to continue with the app but it kept kicking me out of the app. I wanted to keep exploring the map but the layout of everything bored me to death. Would not recommend this scummy app.
attributes.title: Horrendous Quality
